snippet: Chhapte Sherpa, an assistant manager at the popular appetizing shop on Houston Street, went from guiding adventurers in the Himalayas to rescuing smoked fish from a hurricane.
abstract: Character Study column on Chhapte Sherpa Pinasha, assistant manager at popular lox purveyor Russ & Daughters, who also belongs to renowned tribe of Himalayan mountain people known for helping adventurers up Mount Everest.
lead_paragraph: Chhapte Sherpa, an assistant manager at the popular appetizing shop on Houston Street, went from guiding adventurers in the Himalayas to rescuing smoked fish from a hurricane.

headline.seo: A Guide for Summits and Lox
headline.main: The Lox Sherpa of Russ & Daughters
headline.print_headline: A Guide for Summits and Lox
